info.name: Another AfterEffects TikTok Edit
info.description: An After Effects Tik Tok type of edit. If u look on Tik Tok at "Jugg" edits you may see the similarities this is as simple as it gets though people on Tik Tok have a lot more effects in their edits maybe I'll learn more about Shadertoy and add some.
